div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a _SubjectPhysicalPosition

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass
CodeDisplayDefinition
_SubjectPhysicalPositionsubject physical positionThe spatial relationship of a subject whether human, other animal, or plant, to a frame of reference such as gravity or a collection device.

description.value: The spatial relationship of a subject whether human, other animal, or plant, to a frame of reference such as gravity or a collection device.
